moves.name: Powder Snow
moves.effect: Has a very small chance of leaving the target frozen.

moves.name: X Regen All
moves.effect: Makes all allied sync pairs gradually heal themselves.

moves.name: Attention Here!
moves.effect: Makes opponents target the user for a short time. Sharply raises the Sp. Atk of all allied sync pairs.

moves.name: Ice Beam
moves.effect: Has a very small chance of leaving the target frozen.

syncMove.name: Glacial Freeze-Dry
syncMove.description: Become Mega Glalie until the end of battle.

passives.name: Snow Shelter
passives.description: Protects the Pokémon from damage from a hailstorm.

passives.name: Fortuitous 4
passives.description: Has a good chance of raising the user’s Attack, Defense, Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, Speed, accuracy, or evasiveness at random when an attack is successful.

Unflappable- Prevents the Pokémon from flinching.
Healing Hail 1- Restores the Pokémon’s HP whenever it takes an action during a hailstorm.
First Aid 4- Restores a bit of the Pokémon’s HP once during battle when the Pokémon is in a pinch.
